on reading compounds: 鋏角【キョウカク】chelicera, mouthparts of chelicerates (including arachnids)
鋏角亜門【キョウカクアモン】Chelicerata, suborder comprising arachnids, sea spiders, and horseshoe crabs
入鋏【ニュウキョウ】(ticket) punching
kun reading compounds: 鋏【はさみ】scissors, shears, clippers, hole punch
改札鋏【かいさつはさみ】ticket punch
剪む【はさむ】to clip, to snip
